oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Grandview Heights Church of Christ, 2001 June
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Grandview Heights Church of Christ located at 2605 Nolensville Road in Nashville, Tennessee. This congregation was founded in 1892, and the building pictured was erected in 1954. In 2006 the Brentwood Hills Church of Christ acquired the property to house a Spanish-speaking congregation that they sponsored. The foundation is brick. The exterior walls are brick. The roof is gabled and flat in places, with tar shingles. The windows are stained glass. The doors are wooden. Special features include four square columns at the front entrance. Forms part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Sacred Sites Survey Project. 1 photograph : col. ; 4 x 6 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Iglesia de Cristo en Grandview (Nashville, Tenn.); Grandview Heights Church of Christ (Nashville, Tenn.)
